Based on the observations from the WHOIS data, the recent creation of the domain, the substantial discounts offered on products, the absence of social media mentions or reports, and the generic nature of the contact information, I am inclined to believe that shoesshopfr.com exhibits several characteristics of a scam website, particularly those of a fake shopping site. I now know the final answer. The URL https://shoesshopfr.com/ is likely a scam website.
